name: Battle Gide
description:
Improve your character, discover amazing upgrades, kill zombies. Based on my first Scratch video game.

You can download it on this website as...

Chromebook, PC or Android.

It is currently in beta phase and I have only been able to do the most essential, soon, I will do many more things, since the updates will contain:

-Temporary events.

-New Skins.

-New seasons (depending on the Version).

-Error correction.

-New things in story mode.

And much more!

The mobile version is compatible for chromebooks.

ATTENTION!

The game doesn't have save. So... when you quit out the game, you will lose all your thing. I'm Sorry, I'm working to do the save for the game with a code.

(mobile version is not a mobile version now, I have to put the pad control to be a movile version, sorry) For now, it can be executable for Chromebooks.
